scripts.init:dev: npx concurrently "npx shx cp -n .env.example .env" "npx shx cp -n .env.example .env.test" "npx shx cp -n ./.vscode/default.settings.json ./.vscode/settings.json" && npm run docker-up:dev && npm run migrate:init && npm run prisma:seed
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:e2e: npm run docker-down:dev && npm run docker-down:test && npm run docker-up:test && npm run migrate:init && cross-env NODE_ENV=test prisma db seed && npx playwright install && cross-env NODE_ENV=test playwright test && npm run docker-down:test
scripts.test:e2e:debug: npm run docker-down:dev && npm run docker-down:test && npm run docker-up:test && npm run migrate:init && cross-env NODE_ENV=test prisma db seed && npx playwright install && cross-env NODE_ENV=test playwright test --debug && npm run docker-down:test
scripts.prepare-docker:dev: shx mkdir -p ./docker-data/db && mkdir -p ./docker-data/redis && sudo chmod -R 777 ./docker-data && sudo chown -R 1001:1001 ./docker-data
scripts.docker-up:test: npm run create-db-script && docker compose -f docker-compose.test.yml up -d --wait --force-recreate --remove-orphans && npm run config-keycloak
scripts.docker-up:dev: npm run create-db-script && npm run prepare-docker:dev && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d --wait --remove-orphans && npm run config-keycloak
scripts.docker-cleanup: docker image prune && docker system prune -a
scripts.coverage:report: shx rm -rf coverage && shx rm -rf .nyc_output && npm run test:e2e && npx nyc report && npx http-server ./coverage -p 8090 -o

engines.yarn: Please use npm instead of yarn.
engines.pnpm: Please use npm instead of pnpm.
